hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ph.HEADPHOTOPATH AS photo FROM t_portal_userphoto ph,( SELECT PK_T_PORTAL_ACCOUNT_USERID AS ID FROM t_portal_account WHERE UID = :uid ) temp WHERE ph.ACCOUNT = temp.ID ;
SELECT PHRASE FROM t_portal_moodphrase WHERE ACCOUNT IN ( SELECT PK_T_PORTAL_ACCOUNT_USERID FROM t_portal_account WHERE UID = :uid ) ORDER BY CREATETIME DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT sub.id as id, sub.createrId as createrId, sub.createTime as createTime, sub.content as content, sub.flag as flag, sub.departmentId as departmentId, sub.title as title, sub.moduleId as moduleId, sub.lastUpdateTime as lastUpdateTime, sub.parentId as parentId, sub.createrName as createrName, sub.progress as progress, sub.departmentName as departmentName, master.flag as masterFlag FROM t_sm2_subject sub, ( SELECT sub_id,flag FROM t_sm2_subject_master WHERE user_uid = :uid ) master WHERE sub.moduleId = :moduleId ORDER BY master.flag ASC ,sub.lastUpdateTime DESC

SELECT ty.id as id ,su.cou as cout ,ty.name as name FROM t_sm2_type ty LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(sub.typeId) as cou,sub.typeId as tyId FROM t_sm2_subject sub, ( SELECT sub_id FROM t_sm2_subject_master WHERE user_uid = :uid AND flag in (0,2) ) ma WHERE sub.id = ma.sub_id AND sub.moduleId = :moduleId GROUP BY sub.typeId ) su ON su.tyId = ty.id
